document_data.caption: A map showing the Vampire's Tooth (labeled #8) in northeast Luthcheq.
document_data.name: The Vampire's Tooth
document_data.mainbody: The '''Vampire's Tooth''' was a [[tavern]] located in the capital city of [[Luthcheq]] in [[Chessenta]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|4420 Luthcheq}}
document_data.Location: The tavern was located in northeast Luthcheq along the coast of the [[Bay of Chessenta]] across the street from [[the Bloody Roger]] [[inn]].
